Numbers__05.7__Shall confess: : This confession and satisfaction, ordained in the Old Law, was a figure of the sacrament of penance.
Numbers__05.14__The spirit of jealousy: : This ordinance was designed to clear the innocent, and to prevent jealous husbands from doing mischief to their wives: as likewise to give all a horror of adultery, by punishing it in so remarkable a manner.
